name: The Muybridge Mausoleum
description: Like an art installation in virtual reality, The Muybridge Mausoleum playfully blends elements of shadow play, 19th century magic lantern shows, and early film set design. The result is a cinema for neanderthals.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 480 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
